value: address=Lago Las Rocas, Lago Puelo 6km away from the town of Segundo Corral

content=Ulaa Patagonia is a secluded resort located inbetween lakes Las Rocas and Puelo Inferior. It features more than 200 hectares of wilderness covered by forests of millenary alerces and arrayanes. A must if you're in the area!

content=Hostel close to the lake  and river with free hiking and entrance to Lago Puelo. 30 Pesos a night camping with full access to kitchen / showers. 55 Pesos for the hostel. Natural Restaurant serving authentic Italian and Israeli food. Natural mudhouse made for meditation, wild blackberries and free bike rentals. Ran by a very nice local couple. Popular with Israeli tourists.
